com.inqwell.any.io

Class ReplacingOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.ObjectOutputStream
        • com.inqwell.any.io.ReplacingOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReplacingStream, Closeable, DataOutput, Flushable, ObjectOutput, ObjectStreamConstants, AutoCloseable

    public class ReplacingOutputStream
extends ObjectOutputStream
implements ReplacingStream
    Extends JDK serialization to support object replacement on output according to a replacement map.
